pkgmetadata.longdescription: # module_python![basic-test](https://github.com/molabokchi/module_python/workflows/basic-test/badge.svg)module python library# Requirement Installation```consolepython3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt```# Generate Python GRPC files from ProtoType the following at the root```consolepython3 -m grpc_tools.protoc -I. --python_out=. --pyi_out=. --grpc_python_out=. deepdriver/sdk/interface/grpc_interface.proto```
